channel.title: RunScape 2007 Remake
channel.description: [size=24pt]Hello everyone, i use to run a server with around 30+ players on all day. Now i would like to start a new project and do a slight 2007 remake. would anyone join? It isnt going to be easy to level up or make money. i will not be doing a drop party ever to start the eco or get players. the eco will grow by people skilling and selling their items or monster killing. i will be adding little quests and much more. i would love recommendations and i will need a mod eventually. i am not going to make everyone staff. i would like only one admin and one mod untill we get many more players. Who would like to help! email me if you would like to speak in private, seannabi97@gmail.com [/size]

item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:4, topic:540701”]Hello i used to work a 9 to 5 job at walmart. Now with google technologies i make $8400 american dollars per hour all from the comfort of my own home! please send me an email or personal message for more information on these opportunities and i can assure you and your family will not be disappoint. ~julie[/quote]There’s no need for that.

OT:
You should add more information about this project and at least post it in the correct board here.

Read full topic
